rdf:Description.dc:title: Alberta's peatlands and non-settled area wetlands : a background report 1993 a background report.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Water Resources Commission.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Report providing a summary of information about peatlands in the province, and slough/marsh wetlands in the Non-settled Area as well as policy recommendations concerning wetland management in Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Peatlands
Peatlands
Wetlands
Wetlands
Wetland conservation
